titles.title: To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to include child development and early learning as community services under the Federal work-study program.
To amend the Higher Education Act of 1965 to include child development and early learning as community services under the Federal work-study program.

action.text: Referred to the House Committee on Education and Labor.

term.name: Social work, volunteer service, charitable organizations

bill.summary: This bill adds child development and early learning to the list of community services in which undergraduate, graduate, and professional students may participate under a federal work-study program.
